Educational application for children.For children who like adventure, history ebook. Fairytale is a priority before bedtime. Inspired by the legendary grimm, the fantasy begins reading.Music Lyrics:Marching soldierHead paper.Who does not march rightis arrested in barracks.The barracks caught fire,Francisco gave the signal.Acode, acode, acode national flag.Spend quality time alongside their children with great story fantastic, in a world with dragons, witches, warriors and princesses and without forgetting the Happy Forever.I wrote and drew this ebook for my sisters, the fact is that they loved and I promise I will write more and more, I hope his brothers and sons also worship, criticisms and suggestions are open.Education begins in reading but a good read that stirs the imagination.
